title: Question About Prorated Charges
description: A customer who upgraded their plan mid-cycle is asking why their latest bill is higher than expected.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the correct bill.

tasks.description: Identify the prorated charges for the plan upgrade.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the line items corresponding to the proration.

tasks.description: Clearly explain how prorated charges are calculated and that their next bill will be for the normal, expected amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully educates the customer about prorated billing.
